channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Astronomers' theory of how galaxies formed may be upended

item.title: A milestone in the study of octopus arms
item.description: Research describes a computational model that captures the intricate muscular architecture of an octopus arm.

item.title: While more is better, even moderate amounts of exercise may reduce risk for common heart condition
